name: Mob Minion Module
description: Foundry VTT module for managing minion mobs in Mutants & Masterminds 3e

stories.name: GM Creates New Mob
stories.description: GM creates a new empty mob container to group minions

stories.name: GM Adds Selected Minions to Mob
stories.description: GM selects minion tokens and adds them to an existing mob

stories.name: GM Removes Minion from Mob
stories.description: GM removes a specific minion from a mob

stories.name: GM Views Mob Composition
stories.description: GM views the minions in a mob and their status

stories.name: GM Disbands Mob
stories.description: GM deletes a mob, releasing minions back to individual control

epics.name: Configure Strategy
epics.description: Setting up how mobs behave in combat

stories.name: GM Assigns Strategy to Mob
stories.description: GM selects a targeting strategy for the mob (attack strongest, weakest, defend leader, attack most damaged)

stories.name: GM Views Available Strategies
stories.description: GM sees list of available strategies with descriptions

stories.name: GM Changes Mob Strategy
stories.description: GM changes the mob's strategy during combat

stories.name: System Selects Target Based on Strategy
stories.description: System evaluates potential targets and selects one based on the mob's strategy

stories.name: Mob Executes Coordinated Attack
stories.description: All minions in mob attack the selected target together

stories.name: Minions Move to Target
stories.description: Melee minions move toward target, ranged minions position appropriately

stories.name: System Resolves Mob Attack Results
stories.description: System calculates and applies attack results for the mob

epics.name: Mob Templates
epics.description: Reusable mob configurations for quick spawning

stories.name: GM Saves Mob as Template
stories.description: GM saves current mob configuration as a reusable template

stories.name: GM Creates Mob from Template
stories.description: GM quickly creates a new mob instance from a saved template

stories.name: GM Views and Manages Templates
stories.description: GM views, edits, or deletes saved mob templates

concepts.Minion: Individual token/actor in Foundry VTT that can be grouped into mobs
concepts.Mob: Collection of minions that act together as a coordinated unit
concepts.Strategy: Targeting/action algorithm that determines how the mob selects and attacks targets
concepts.MobTemplate: Reusable blueprint defining minion types, leader, and strategy for quick mob creation
concepts.Target: The entity selected by the mob's strategy for attack

strategies: Attack Strongest - Target with highest power level
Attack Weakest - Target with lowest power level
Defend Leader - Protect designated leader, attack threats
Attack Most Damaged - Target with most existing damage

references: Foundry VTT M&M 3e system on GitHub
